title: I guess it has been asked before, but..
content: What is the sans font that is used here, at typophile for titles and in the logo and the header menu?
author: uriash

comments.content: [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018082850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gotham) and [Mercury](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018082850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mercury). Take a look at the home page. You may need to turn your monitor on its side to read it, but the fonts are listed right there.

I see Mercury mentioned but not Gotham. This being said, if you open the masthead file [http://typophile.com/misc/masthead.swf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018082850/http:/typophile.com/misc/masthead.swf), and right click to zoom in till you can see

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018082850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/forums_lrg_6698.gif)
  
then you get a match when you check with [Gotham medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018082850/http:/typography.com/catalog/gotham/testdriver/gotham_medium.html)
And "TYPOPHILE" in the logo would be [Gotham bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018082850/http:/typography.com/catalog/gotham/testdriver/gotham_bold.html)
